categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Backstab 1 was a French roleplaying magazine from January/February 1997. It contained a roleplaying article entitled "Pile je gagne, face tu perds," which translates to "Tails I win, heads you lose." The article contained information about the space station Pegasus XIII. The article was compatible with the West End Games D6 roleplaying system.
